name: Aequis
description:
It was taking longer to import the assets into Godot, but I set a deadline for the first playable in March.

It's just the dialogue for the prologue and the Pharaoh quest. With some bad AI art as placeholders, mostly so I could adjust the transparency of the dialogue box.

If you select 'explore' you can
WASD or arrow keys to move

press 'space' to toggle mouse look.
